__e: You'll still get a prosecution, just without Ruby, and you'll have me as well.
So that must have been nice, having Ruby and the baby under one roof.
I know you're looking for Ruby.
I've seen a million dollars and believe me, Ruby looks a whole lot better.
So, Ruby, you're finally legal now and you know what that means.
But Ruby is always good to the ones he likes... and he always liked you, didn't he?
